title: As a Club, I want Minor League Compensation returned through the MJC API
custom_preconds:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Feed+Requirements%3A+Major+League+Contracts#ClubFeedRequirements:MajorLeagueContracts-5.IncludethefollowingfieldsfromtheMinorLeagueCompensationsection:
GIVEN a club user is logged in with correct API role to be able to run MJC API
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to "EBIS Link" screen from left nav
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to query by PlayerID
AND user should be able to query by ContractID
AND user should be able to query by Last Changed Datestamp Range
AND fields listed on the linked wiki under Minor League Compensation section should be added to the API
AND data in the response must exactly match data on the UI in the Minor League Compensation section
AND response should be returned under 2 seconds

title: As a Club, I want Comments returned through the MJC API
custom_preconds:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Feed+Requirements%3A+Major+League+Contracts#ClubFeedRequirements:MajorLeagueContracts-7.IncludethefollowingfieldsfromtheCommentssection:
GIVEN a club user is logged in with correct API role to be able to run MJC API
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to "EBIS Link" screen from left nav
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to query by PlayerID
AND user should be able to query by ContractID
AND user should be able to query by Last Changed Datestamp Range
AND fields listed on the linked wiki under Comments section should be added to the API
AND data in the response must exactly match data on the UI in the Comments section
AND response should be returned under 2 seconds

title: As a BOC User, I want to View the Tender Sheet for an Org
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the BOC user logs in
AND navigates to Central Tender Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks an Org's Status in the Central Tender Widget
custom_expected:
THEN system will load the Central Tender Utility displaying the Org's Tender Sheet
AND The form will match the provided wireframe and data discovery
AND The sheet displayed will be for Tender Year selected on the Central Tender Widget

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: As a Club User, I want to View the Tender Sheet for my Org
custom_preconds: GIVEN Club user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Central Tender under Major Contracts Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN user will be directed to Central Tender Utility
AND The tender utility will default to their Club and the current Tender Year
AND The form will match the provided wireframe and data discovery

NOTE: The Central Tender Widget is a BOC Only widget and is not visible to Clubs
Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: As a User, I want to Edit the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in Central Tender Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on EDIT
custom_expected:
THEN system will reload the form in edit mode
AND While in edit mode, will the form will match the provided wireframe and data discovery

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: As a BOC User, I want to Delete a Player from the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the EDIT button
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a delete icon on each player's row
AND Clicking the delete icon will remove the player from the tender list
AND If the user saves their updates, the Utility will reload in view mode and the player will not appear in the list
AND If the user cancels their updates, the Utility will reload in view mode and the player will return to the list
AND This can be done at any time, even after freezing the list

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: As a User, I want to Update a player's Salary Info through the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN users clicks on  Salary Info button for a player
custom_expected:
THEN system will open the player's Salary Info modal in edit mode
AND the editable fields will match the provided data discovery and wire
AND Clicking the Ok button or the 'X' will close the modal and retain the changes made to the modal
AND Clicking 'Cancel' will close the modal and discard the changes made to the modal

Wire:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=salary_info

title: As a User, I want to Save updates made to the Salary Info modal on the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN users opens the Salary Info modal in Edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an Okay button and an 'X' icon
AND When either one is the clicked, the modal will close, retaining any changes made
AND When the modal is closed, the Utility will still be in edit mode
AND There will be a Save button on the Utility
AND Clicking Save will save all changes, including those made to the Modal, and reload the utility in View mode
AND There will be a Cancel button on the Utility
AND Clicking Cancel will cancel all changes, including those made to the Modal, and reload the utility in View mode

Wire:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=salary_info

title: As a User, I want to switch between different player's Salary Info modals on the Central Tender
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN users opens the Salary Info modal in View/Edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Previous button and a Next button
AND Clicking the Previous button will refresh the Modal with the salary info of the previous player appearing in the utility
AND Clicking the Next button will refresh the modal with the salary info of the next player appearing in the utility
AND If any data had been entered, it will be retained when the player is switched 

Wire:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=salary_info

title: As a BOC User, I want to Freeze the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to Freeze the tender list
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Freeze button either on Central Tender Widget and the Central Tender Utility
custom_expected:
THEN Clicking the Freeze button will freeze the Central Tender Utility to all Club users and prevent them from making and saving any updates
AND If a club user started to make changes before the central tender year was frozen, and tries to save after it has been marked as frozen, they will get an error message indicating that their changes were not saved and to contact the LRD.
  -- Body: "The Central Tender Utility has been frozen and your changes will not be saved.  Please contact a member of the Labor Relations Department."
  --  Button: Ok
AND Clicking Ok will reload the Utility in View Mode
AND If a club user loads the screen while the central tender year is frozen, it will be indicated on the screen with an appropriate message, and the screen will be read-only

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_widget

title: As a User, I want to Add a Player to the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks EDIT button
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an 'Add Player' button (btn-sm) on the page, as depicted in the attached wire
AND Clicking the 'Add Player' button will add a new row to the bottom of the utility
AND The table will auto scroll to the newly added row
AND The Player column of the new row will be an autocomplete search that mimics the Arbitration Utility player search functionality (both in display and population)
AND This can be done at any time, even after the results are marked final

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: As a Club User, I want to be prevented from viewing other Clubs' Tender Sheets until after the Tender Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club user logs in
AND current date is before Major League Tender Date on System Dates screen
custom_steps: WHEN Club tries to view other Clubs' Tender Sheets
custom_expected:
THEN Club User's will not be allowed to view other Clubs' Tender Sheets until after the Tender Date (system date)
AND If a Club User attempts to view another Clubs' tender sheet prior to the current tender year's tender date, They will be given the following blocking message:
  -- Body: "You may not load another club's worksheet until after the Tender Date."
  -- Button: Ok
AND Clicking Ok will close the message and return the user to the Utility
BUT if current date is on or After Major League Tender Date, club user should be able to see other clubs tender sheets

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: Rule to Prevent Saving the Central Tender Utility with Blank Rows
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility in Edit mode
AND user Clicked on the Add Player button to add a row
custom_steps: WHEN user clicked on save leaving the new row blank
custom_expected:
THEN system should run a rule check
AND an error message should prevent user from saving the utility

title: As a User, I want  clicking Cancel to trigger a confirmation Modal
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility in Edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Cancel button
custom_expected:
THEN system will trigger the "Are you sure modal"
AND Clicking yes cancels changes and toggles the form back to view mode
AND Clicking no dismisses the modal and the form remains in edit mode

Wire:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: As a User, I want to Submit Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility in View/Edit mode
AND Central Tender Utility is in Preliminary State
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Submit button
custom_expected:
THEN system will update the following fields on both the Central Tender Utility and the Central Tender Widget
  -- Status
  -- Submitted
  -- Submitted By
AND If in edit mode, the form will refresh in View Mode

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: As a BOC User, I want to Verify the Central Tender Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is in Central Tender Utility in View/Edit mode
AND Central Tender Utility is in Submitted State
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Verify button
custom_expected:
THEN system will update the following fields on both the Central Tender Utility and the Central Tender Widget
  -- Status
  -- Verified
  -- Verified By
AND If in edit mode, the form will refresh in View Mode

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: As a Club User, I want to Edit a Tender Sheet that is in Submitted or Verified State
custom_preconds: GIVEN Club user opens a tender sheet in Submitted or Verified State
custom_steps:
WHEN user Edits the Tender Sheet
AND clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN system will be given the following warning message:
  -- Body:  "You may not edit the Tender Utility while it is Submitted or Verified state.  If you continue, the Tender Sheet will be un-submitted and returned to Preliminary state.  Would you like to continue?
 -- Buttons: Yes, No
AND If the user selects Yes, their changes are committed and the following fields are updated on both the Central Tender Utility and the Central Tender Widget
  -- Status
  -- Verified
  -- Verified By
Or If they select No, the warning is closed.

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_utility

title: Update Arbitration Logic to Handle Non-Tenders
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player is displayed on the arb eligibles utility
custom_steps: WHEN player has an "EFA (XXA2C) - Non Tender" transaction approved for him
custom_expected:
THEN if the utility has been finalized for the given year his arb status should be updated on the utility to 'Non - Tendered'
BUT if the utility has NOT been finalized for the given year the player should be removed from the utility

title: As a User, I want to make sure Club Effective Dates aren't overlapping
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an MN Affiliate Club has been renamed via the 'Rename Club' process
AND user has opened the new version of the club profile in edit mode
AND user has entered an Effective Date on the new club profile that is before the End Date on the previous club profile
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN system should run a check against effective dates to make sure the current dates are not overlapping with previous versions of the club
AND system should return a blocker error message:
AND error message title should be  "Invalid Effective Date"
AND error message body should be "New effective dates can not be earlier than the end date of a previous version of the club"
AND error message hint text should be "You need to modify the effective date so it is after the prior version's end date"

title: As a User, I want to Rename a Club during a Reaffiliation
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Reaffiliation Widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters effective date and clicks continue button to display Reaffiliation blocks
custom_expected:
THEN if Current Affiliation Org is different than New Affiliation Org, then New Club is a text box and is populated with the Current Club Name
AND the textbox with the new club name will be editable
OR If Current Affiliation Org is the same as New Affiliation Org then New Club is a dropdown containg the Org's existing affiliates
Wire:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=club_reaffiliation

title: As a User, I want to view Reaffiliation Details
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in Reaffiliation utility
AND entered Reaffiliation information on Reaffiliation block(s)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Continue on the on Reaffiliations screen
custom_expected:
THEN clicking the button will launch the Reaffiliation Details modal
AND The modal will match the provided wireframe and data discovery
AND There will be a Back button on the modal
AND Clicking the Back button will close the modal

Wire:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=club_reaffiliation

title: Reaffiliation Permissions - System BOC Admins
custom_preconds:
Wire:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=club_reaffiliation
Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Reaffiliation+Utility+-+Reaffiliations+-+Data+Discovery
GIVEN Reaffiliation is it's own permission group that is tied to the System BOC Admin role group
AND there is no view only permission set
AND a BOC user is logged in with an account that is part of the System BOC Admin role group
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to do anything with reaffiliation
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view Reaffilation Utility
 AND user should be able to perform all actions related to reaffiliation
BUT users without this role should not be able to view or peform any actions related to reaffiliation

title: As a User, I want to upload a new logo for a Club Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in Affiliate Profiles Widget
AND has a MJ/MN Club profile open in EDIT mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the pencil icon in the lower right hand corner of the the Club Logo
custom_expected:
THEN system will open a file browser so the user can select a file
AND Image must be a .png
AND If the image is a .png, the file will upload and it will be displayed in the logo preview
AND Clicking save on the Club Profile will save changes to the logo
AND If the image is not a .png, throw an error
  Title: Invalid file format
  Body: Please upload your logo as a .png
  Hint: Your logo should be saved with a transparent background to display correctly throughout the EBIS.
AND If there is no logo uploaded, the system will display the Org logo wherever a logo is needed (i.e. DSL team)

Wireframe:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=edit_logo

title: As a User, I want to Edit the Legal Club Name(s) section on a MJ Club Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the BOC user is in Affiliates Widget
AND user opened MJ Club Profile in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user is in Legal Club Name(s) section of the profile
custom_expected:
THEN layout will match the provided wire and data discovery
AND Clicking the Add Row Button will add a new row to the table
AND Clicking the trash can icon will delete the respective row

Note:
 - Primary Legal Name must be active (no end date)

Wireframe:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=major_league_affiliate_profile

AND Club has a Primary Legal Name selected
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing Legal Club Name(s) section of the profile

AND radio buttons will be displayed as green check marks, as depicted in the wire

title: As a User, I want Club Nickname and Abbreviation fields to be saved with consistent formatting
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in a affiliate profile
AND Club Nickname and Abbreviation fields are entered
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN Club Nicknames will be saved and displayed in Camel Case
AND Abbreviations will be saved and displayed in ALL CAPS

title: As a User, I want to Create a New Club from the Reaffiliation Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Reaffiliation Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on 'Add New Club' button
custom_expected:
THEN the new club block will appear in edit mode
AND the layout will match the provided wire and data discovery
AND here will continue to be an 'Add New Club' button even when the new club block is displayed, as more than one club can be created through this process

Wire:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=club_reaffiliation

title: As a User, I want to Save New Clubs from the Reaffiliation Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user in Reaffiliation Utility
custom_steps:
When the new club block is in edit mode 
and all required fields have been populated
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a blue 'Save Club(s) and Continue' button as depicted in the provided wire
AND before the required fields are populated, the button is disabled
AND Clicking the 'Save Club(s) and Continue' button will create the new Club(s) using the effective date entered

title: As a User, I want to run the Player/Agent Listing by Org Report
custom_preconds:
Report Layout: https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=111641364

Report Details: https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=111641388

Population, Logic, and Sorting: https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=111641397

Prompts: https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=111641404

GIVEN a user is logged in as club or boc
AND user has navigated to Reporting Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks link for Player/Agent Listing by Org Report
custom_expected:
THEN system will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
AND Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements.
